entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
